body: Lmao idk what to say anymore, the story is just change like 180° from its first road. Somehow the slime turns out to be a good creature after eating like 3 ppl, it just makes no sense (the only way to describe this is somehow the wife mind has been merged with the slime, keep the last bit of "humanity", otherwise no, i cant think any reason for this hard driff). It's like the aithor mind at the first time is "i want to do a dark story" then suddenly 3 days later "enough of this shit, let's go back to vanilla"
Oh fuck.
just what's with this "out of order" tag jeez

the jelly doesn't seem evil as it does try to emulate the life of the person it consumes, and in this chapter we also see see downsides it has depending on the body it takes over causing it's jelly form to become unstable.

jelly thing is alien like symbiote venom type. MC wife already dead since chapter 1 after that jelly use her as a new 'host'. That jelly need to change host regularly until the body worn out, they will die if they dont find new host.
